1514270.name: Forest Farm Demo
1514270.description:
In Forest Farm you'll be in charge of creating and managing your own farm, your way. Choose where you'll plant your plots, which seeds you'll plant, which animals you'll keep and much much more.

Get ready to make the farm your own and create a thriving ecosystem.

Demo Features:
9 plants, vegetables and fruit to grow
3 Layers - trees, bushes and root vegetables
Customized garden layouts - dig your plots in your own design
Locomotion Options - smooth locomotion, snap turning and teleport locomotion options
Tree logging - clear forests with your axe and recycle lumber into soil
Moving Fences - to protect your crops
Animals - feed, pet, and fence in rabbits
Search the land - Forage, fish or break stones in search of raw ingredients
Day/Night cycle - Controlling the behaviour of animals and making your farm scenic
1514270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
